trans-unit.source: Choose type of event

Currently we have 3 event types: 1. simple: The event will only be shown at one date. 2. recurring: The most complex event. You have the possibility to configure nearly everything of this event. 3. duration: The event has a fixed start and end. Good for trips/travelling tours.
Move event on top of list
This is the title of the event
This is the title of the event. It will be displayed as header for each event in frontend.
A short teaser for this event
A little teaser for this event. It will be used to show just 1 or 2 sentences in list view instead of a cropped text of full description.
When does the event begin?

Please choose an event date in the near future or in the early past. That's because of a configuration in ExtensionManager for this extension. There you can configure an amount of months for calculating day records in past and future. Default: 3 month past. 6 month future. It's up to the admin to change these values. If you enter a date with 6 month in past, no day record will be created. So this date will not be displayed in frontend.
When does the event end?
This is a special date for events of type "duration" and defines, when an event ends. It is a required field.
When does the event starts?
This is the basic time for all generated day records. It can be overridden with individual times defined here in this record.
This event starts multiple times at one day.
Activate this option to add further time records for this event.
Add further time records
The added time records will be appended to basic event time record. In frontend you will see all time records for this event.
Repeat each x th week of month
This option is always a combination between the fields xth and weekday. If you keep xth and/or weekday empty NO day record will be generated. The frondend will not display this event.
Repeat each defined weekday
This option is always a combination between the fields xth and weekday. If you keep xth and/or weekday empty NO day record will be generated. The frondend will not display this event.
Create time records for a special weekday
This option will override multiple_times for one day and event_time completely.
Let event repeat each, seconds, third or forth week
A special date when repeating an event should end.
If you do not enter a date, a date from ExtensionManager configuration will be used. Default +12 month.
Special definitions for a defined date
Add an additional date. Add another time record for a special date. Mark a date as removed. Add further information for a special date.
Explain on detail what happens at that event
Activate, if this is a cost free event
Create a ticket link record
Create a location record. This is a requirement.
Create an organizer record. This is a requirement.
You can define some images here, which you can see in detail view of your event
Do you have a YouTube video link, which will describe this event. Add it here.
Do you have some information as PDF? Add them here.
